page.title: 01LANDSCAPE IN ABERNYTE
page.content: The Abernyte Area is a happy,friendly neighbourhood with one small village and two tiny hamlets.The area has two different kinds of land, one third of it flat, down on the Carse of Gowrie and two thirds hilly, on the Braes of the Carse of the Sidlaw Hills.The land rises from 15 metres at the Milk Bar to 254 metres at Abernyte Hill,its highest point.There is one main stream crossing the area flowing from Pitmiddle Hill down to the Tay. It is a farming area with rich soil for mixed farming on the hill and fruit farming on the lower land.As well as being a farming area many people, who live in the area work in Dundee or Perth.It is a popular place for people from Perth and Dundee to come for drives,picnics and walks.
